com.heiman.mqttsdk.smartlink.esptochsdk.task

接口 __IEsptouchTask

  • 所有已知实现类:
    __EsptouchTask

    public interface __IEsptouchTask
    IEsptouchTask defined the task of esptouch should offer. INTERVAL here means the milliseconds of interval of the step. REPEAT here means the repeat times of the step.
    作者:
    afunx

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static boolean DEBUG
      Turn on or off the log.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      IEsptouchResult executeForResult()
      Note: !!!
      java.util.List<IEsptouchResult> executeForResults(int expectTaskResultCount)
      Note: !!!
      void interrupt()
      Interrupt the Esptouch Task when User tap back or close the Application.
      boolean isCancelled() 
      void setEsptouchListener(IEsptouchListener esptouchListener)
      set the esptouch listener, when one device is connected to the Ap, it will be called back

    • 字段详细资料

      • DEBUG

        static final boolean DEBUG
        Turn on or off the log.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • setEsptouchListener

        void setEsptouchListener(IEsptouchListener esptouchListener)
        set the esptouch listener, when one device is connected to the Ap, it will be called back
        参数:
        esptouchListener - when one device is connected to the Ap, it will be called back

      • interrupt

        void interrupt()
        Interrupt the Esptouch Task when User tap back or close the Application.

      • executeForResult

        IEsptouchResult executeForResult()
                          throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Note: !!!Don't call the task at UI Main Thread or RuntimeException will be thrown Execute the Esptouch Task and return the result
        返回:
        the IEsptouchResult
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • executeForResults

        java.util.List<IEsptouchResult> executeForResults(int expectTaskResultCount)
                                           throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Note: !!!Don't call the task at UI Main Thread or RuntimeException will be thrown Execute the Esptouch Task and return the result
        参数:
        expectTaskResultCount - the expect result count(if expectTaskResultCount <= 0, expectTaskResultCount = Integer.MAX_VALUE)
        返回:
        the list of IEsptouchResult
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
